Package com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.controller

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
com.olegtoropoff.petcareappointment.controller.UserController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/v1/users") public class UserController extends Object
Controller for managing users in the system. Provides endpoints for user registration, updates, password changes, and data retrieval.

      @PostMapping("/register") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<CustomApiResponse> register(@RequestBody RegistrationRequest request)
      Registers a new user.
      Parameters:
      request - the registration request containing user details
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the created user's details

      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to update

      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the updated user's details
